E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Jim Abbott
Dear Sir,
Jim Abbott is doing pretty good at A Augusta Pirates!
He has an ERA of 3.22, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Derek Bell
Dear Sir,
Derek Bell has nothing more to prove at AA Harrisburg Senators!
He has an AVG of .291 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1988
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Jack Fimple
